Class MainWeapon

java.lang.Object
Items.Item
Items.MainWeapon
public class MainWeapon extends Item
Represents a main weapon item that can be used by heroes. This class defines the properties and functionalities of a main weapon, including its type, attack power, special effects, and usability by different hero types.

  • Constructor Details

    • MainWeapon

      public MainWeapon(String name, String type, int attackPower, String specialEffect, int cost, String specialEffectType, double effectChance, String effectTarget, int effectValue)
      Constructs a new MainWeapon object.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the weapon.
      type - The type of the weapon. (e.g., "sword", "bow", "staff")
      attackPower - The attack power of the weapon.
      specialEffect - The special effect of the weapon. (e.g., "Burns enemies", "Strong vs. Legendary Enemies")
      cost - The cost of the weapon.
      specialEffectType - The type of special effect. (e.g., "onHit", "passive")
      effectChance - The chance of the special effect activating.
      effectTarget - The target of the special effect. ("self", "enemy", or null)
      effectValue - The value of the special effect. (e.g., damage, healing)

      specialEffect - The special effect of the weapon.
      cost - The cost of the weapon.
